pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot that uses a time-lapse effect to show the transition from day to night. The camera looks up from below at the silhouettes of bare, gnarled tree branches against the sky. The scene transitions from a pale blue dusk sky to a dark night sky, revealing a multitude of twinkling stars.
